bug.short_desc: Calendar: "accept" function for allowable dates to be selected

long_desc.thetext:
See also #8077 and #8088, which provided specific needs for calendar. This is a more general solution.
Instead of just allowing the user to specify an array of weekdays, how about making it more general. Maybe the application requires selection of dates only within a particular range, i.e., Wednesdays or Fridays during the dates 5 February 2014 until 6 March 2014.
I'd suggest an interface such as a user-provided "accept" function which returns true if the selected date is acceptable; false otherwise... or possibly return null if the date is acceptable; or, if the date is not acceptable, a string to display to the user (in some standard fashion) as to what dates are acceptable.
Derrell
